title: Audio Magic
description: An AI-powered web app that separates audio/video songs into vocals and music stems. Allows users to isolate and download their preferred stem, enabling uses like karaoke singing or music production.

title: Pension Management System
description: A pension management application for tracking pensioner details, calculating provisions, and processing transactions with scalable and efficient workflow automation.

title: Advanced Contact Manager
description: A contact management application for organizing and retrieving contacts, with features for adding, deleting, updating, and searching, optimized for enhanced service quality and operations.

title: Note Stack
description: React Node Project for note-taking with RESTful APIs and AWS-hosted PostgreSQL database.

title: Chat Buddy
description: Real-time chat application using Spring Boot and WebSocket for instant messaging.

title: Weather Today
description: Check today's weather using this application.

title: My-Calc
description: A Windows calculator application featuring a modern neomorphic design for an intuitive and visually appealing user experience.
